variable.name: HISTOLOGICALTYPE
variable.description: The category for a neoplasm's histologic subtype

variable.name: PRETREATMENTHISTORY
variable.description: Indicates whether any treatment was given to the patient prior to surgery

variable.name: TUMORTISSUESITE
variable.description: Originating or primary anatomic site of the disease

variable.name: DAYSTOBIRTH
variable.description: Days elapsed from date of initial diagnosis to birth

variable.name: DAYSTODEATH
variable.description: Days elapsed from date of initial diagnosis to death

variable.name: DAYSTOLASTFOLLOWUP
variable.description: Days elapsed from date of initial diagnosis to last follow-up

variable.name: DAYSTOTUMORPROGRESSION
variable.description: Days elapsed from date of initial diagnosis to tumor progression

variable.name: DAYSTOTUMORRECURRENCE
variable.description: Days elapsed from date of initial diagnosis to tumor recurrence

variable.name: AGEATINITIALPATHOLOGICDIAGNOSIS
variable.description: Age at initial pathologic diagnosis in years
